meanings.definition: Emphasizing or highlighting a particular aspect or feature
meanings.sent1: The accenting colors made the painting stand out.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace with accenting beads.
meanings.sent3: The accenting details on the dress were eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: The accenting flavors in the dish created a delightful taste.
meanings.sent5: The accenting music enhanced the mood of the scene.

meanings.definition: Adding emphasis or stress to a syllable or word
meanings.sent1: His accenting pronunciation made the word clear.
meanings.sent2: The accenting syllable was pronounced with extra force.
meanings.sent3: The accenting stress on the word made it easier to understand.
meanings.sent4: She used accenting intonation to convey her point.
meanings.sent5: The accenting emphasis on the syllable changed the meaning of the word.

meanings.definition: Pronouncing words with a distinctive regional or foreign inflection
meanings.sent1: She enjoys accenting her words with a British flair.
meanings.sent2: He is accenting his speech to sound more like a native.
meanings.sent3: The comedian was accenting his jokes with a funny accent.
meanings.sent4: The actor was accenting his lines with a Southern drawl.
meanings.sent5: She was accenting her language with a touch of French elegance.
